title: Provides that community residences shall have their property taxes paid by the state
summary: Provides that community residences shall have their property taxes paid by the state; defines community residences to include facilities operated by or subject to licensure by the office of mental health or office of mental retardation and developmental disabilities; excludes family care homes.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the real property tax law, in relation to property tax exemptions on community residences
